API Documentation

Overview

This page contains sample API documentation for the Glyphx Data Uploader & Extraction API. It is a static example component to get you started.

Authentication

All requests must include an API key in the Authorization header: Authorization: Bearer <API_KEY>.

Endpoints

  • POST /api/v1/upload — Upload one or more documents for processing.
    Body: multipart/form-data with files and optional metadata fields.
  • GET /api/v1/projects — List available projects and their configuration.
  • GET /api/v1/jobs/{jobId} — Get processing status and results for a job.

Sample upload request (curl)

curl -X POST "https://api.example.com/api/v1/upload" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer <API_KEY>" \
  -F "file=@invoice.pdf" \
  -F "project=invoice-du"

Responses

Successful upload returns HTTP 202 with a job id:

{ "jobId": "job_123456", "status": "queued" }

This component is a static starter — if you want, I can wire it to real endpoints or add markdown parsing for richer docs.

` })], ApiDocumentationComponent); export { ApiDocumentationComponent };
